definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
tree trunk/stump (tree root)/a plant/classifier for trees or plants/strain (biology)/to involve others (in shady business)

sentences.english: It over-wintered with the pupa in fallen leaves or the weeds of ground.
sentences.chinese: 以蛹在向陽地的殘株落葉或雜草中越冬。
